entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is a commentator who is present at the scene. He is described as saying 'Well, there you are!' and explaining the order in which the students will face the dragons.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the students who will be facing the dragons. He is described as getting up and going out of the tent with Bagman.

relationships.description: Bagman commented on Harry's situation, explaining the order in which he will face the dragons.
